content.query:
/*
CREATE MASTER KEY ENCRYPTION BY PASSWORD = 'Hera@123'

CREATE DATABASE SCOPED CREDENTIAL SalesCRED
WITH IDENTITY = 'Account Key',
SECRET= '547NffpVoMyDj7N2xeoebprS3OcYZ+FNt8aSWOEfZCVd2K6JjilClnRmYKRLvtW2N0ZP6Zk1t2z5+AStsUTFAw=='


CREATE EXTERNAL DATA SOURCE SalesExSource
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'abfss://root@stcgcasestudy.dfs.core.windows.net',
    CREDENTIAL = SalesCRED,
    TYPE = HADOOP
)

CREATE EXTERNAL FILE FORMAT SalesExfileF WITH(
    FORMAT_TYPE = PARQUET
	--DATA_COMPRESSION = 'org.apache.hadoop.io.compress.SnappyCodec'
)
*/

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Sales.ExCustomers(
	[Customer_Name] VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    [Phone] VARCHAR(50) NULL,
	[Address_Line1] VARCHAR(100) NULL,
	[Address_Line2] VARCHAR(100) NULL,
	[City] VARCHAR(50) NULL,
	[State] VARCHAR(50) NULL,
	[Postal_Code] VARCHAR(50) NULL,
	[Country] VARCHAR(50) NULL,
	[Territory] VARCHAR(50) NULL,
	[Contact_Lastname] VARCHAR(20) NULL,
	[Conact_Firstname] VARCHAR(20) NULL
)
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'Sales_Transformed/dimCustomers',
    DATA_SOURCE = SalesExSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = SalesExfileF
)



CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Sales.ExOrderDate (
    [Order_Number] BIGINT NOT NULL, 
    [Order_Date] DATE NULL,
    [Status] VARCHAR(20) NULL
)
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'Sales_Transformed/dimOrderDate',
    DATA_SOURCE = SalesExSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = SalesExfileF
)


CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Sales.ExProducts(
    [Product_Code] VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    [MSRP] BIGINT NOT NULL,
    [Product_Line] VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'Sales_Transformed/dimProducts',
    DATA_SOURCE = SalesExSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = SalesExfileF
)





CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Sales.ExSalesDeals(
    [Sales] FLOAT NOT NULL,
    [Deal_Size] VARCHAR(30) NULL
)
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'Sales_Transformed/dimSalesDeals',
    DATA_SOURCE = SalesExSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = SalesExfileF
)




CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE Sales.ExOrders(
    [Order_Number] BIGINT NOT NULL,
    [Product_Code] VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	[Customer_Name] VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
	[Quantity_Ordered] BIGINT NOT NULL,
	[Price_Each] FLOAT NOT NULL,
	[Sales] FLOAT NOT NULL

)
WITH(
    LOCATION = 'Sales_Transformed/factOrders',
    DATA_SOURCE = SalesExSource,
    FILE_FORMAT = SalesExfileF
)
